name: Kasethine Escape
description:
-------------------------------------

     Kasethine Escape is an hardcore puzzle solving game set in the Kasethine Universe.  In this game you are an operative trying to escape an Kasethine Research facility however the only way to escape is up.  

Can you escape the Kasethine Research Facility?  Lets see who can get the highest score!

Have fun and I hope you enjoy my game!

-------------------------------------

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Currently there is only two story entry's 

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

All Text is made with Text Mesh Pro.
